title: 4.3.2 Vegetable and Fruit Diseases and Pests
tableTitle: Diseases and Pests in Vegetables and Fruits

tableData.majorDisease: Tuta absoluta, White fly, Aphid, Fruit borer, Bug etc.
tableData.majorPest: Damping off - Early, Late Blight, Mosaic etc.

tableData.majorDisease: Diamond Back Moth, Tobacco Caterpillar, Aphid, Hopper etc.
tableData.majorPest: Soft rot, Black rot, Alternaria, Club root, Damping off etc.

tableData.majorDisease: Blight, Mosaic, Brown rot, Cutworm, Aphid etc.
tableData.majorPest: Potato tuber moth, Red ant, Leaf eating caterpillar etc.

tableData.majorDisease: Diamond Back Moth, Tobacco Caterpillar, Aphid, Hopper etc.
tableData.majorPest: Soft rot, Black rot, Alternaria, Club root, Damping off etc.

tableData.majorDisease: Bug, Aphid, Fruit fly, Scale leaf, Root rot, Foot rot, Powdery mildew, pink disease, anthracnose, citrus scab, Gummosis, sooty mould, Canker, Citrus greening, (Citrus tristeza virus CTV) Lemon dog etc.
tableData.majorPest: Canker, Fruit rot, Root rot, Green bug, Fruit fly, Sooty mould, citrus psylla, Leaf miner, Red spider mite, blue beetle, stem & trunk borer, Aphid, Thrips, Nematode, Lemon butterfly etc.

tableData.majorDisease: Powdery mildew, Downy mildew, Mosaic virus
tableData.majorPest: Red pumpkin beetle, Aulacophora foveicollis, Fruit flies, Bacterocera cucurbitae, Aphids, Aphis gossyypii
Soyabean hairy caterpillar, Spilarctia casigneta, Pod borers, Helicoverpa armigera, Coepea aphids, Aphis craccivora

tableData.majorDisease: Powdery mildew, Fruit cracking, Bacterial black spot, Sooty mould
tableData.majorPest: Fruitfly, Stem Borer, Leaf webber, Stone weevil
Banana aphid, Pseudostem weevil, Black Sigatoka, Banana skipper (Erionota thrax)
